Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers are hopeful that Shohei Ohtani will be back in the lineup for Game 3 on Monday, manager Dave Roberts said.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ohtani got hurt in the seventh inning of the Dodgers' Game 2 win on Saturday at Dodger Stadium, when he jammed his left arm while sliding into second base on an unsuccessful stolen base attempt.
Others: The Dodgers have a two-games-to-none lead over the Yankees in the World Series.
